tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following is most similar in structure to the basal body of a eukaryotic flagellum [fluh-jel-um]?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Centriole
X)Cilium
Y)Bacterial flagellum
Z)Intermediate filament
bonus_question: -   –  What generic group of transport proteins facilitates the diffusion of water across membranes?
